feed.title: Track Awesome Typescript Updates Weekly
feed.subtitle: A collection of awesome TypeScript resources for client-side and server-side development. Write your awesome JavaScript in TypeScript

Acknowledgements / Chrome Extensions

  • 2023 - âš’ Thank you Hamza ( @Hamza12700 https://github.com/Hamza12700 ) for more than 15 merged pull requests (â­4.9k). Great contribution to keeping this list up-to-date with modern TypeScript projects. Contributor of the year 2023.

entry.title: Awesome Typescript Updates on Jul 08 - Jul 14, 2024
entry.content:
Awesome TypeScript Essential Resources

  • ğŸ“š Handbook - Welcome to TypeScript the official resource for learning TypeScript
  • ğŸ“š TypeScript Deep Dive by Basarat Ali Syed
  • ğŸ™ Microsoft/TypeScript on Github (â­105k) fork TypeScript on Github! Or... just read the code
  • ğŸ™The official TypeScript Roadmap (â­105k)
  • ğŸ“š TypeScript Team Blog with announcements and recent updates
  • ğŸ™ DefinitelyTyped/DefinitelyTyped (â­50k) the repository for high quality TypeScript type definitions maintained by Boris Yankov and thousands of contributors
  • ğŸ™ Type search, search for typings on npm
  • ğŸ“š Community Curated Resources
  • ğŸ™ Clean Code concepts adapted for TypeScript (â­9.5k)
  • ğŸ’» Should You Learn TypeScript? (Benefits & Resources)
  • ğŸ’» Learn how to unleash the full potential of the Turing Complete type system of TypeScript!, ğŸ’µ online course with free first 5 chapters by Gabriel Vergnaud
  • ğŸ™ Codebook (â­10) read and run small code snippets to progressively learn TypeScript from the basic to advanced concepts.
  • ğŸ™ Type Challenges (â­46k) Collection of TypeScript type challenges with online judge.

Typescript Project Starters

  • typescript-starter (â­3.5k) â€“Â A CLI to quickly generate and configure new libraries and Node.js projects
  • next-smrt (â­56) â€“Â A Typescript/NextJs boilerplate with Redux/Styled Components/Material UI and TypeSafe Actions.
  • ğŸ™ Next-Postgres-With-Typescript (â­20) - Forum-like fullstack web app boilerplate with Next.js 7.0.2 + Sequelize 4/Postgres + Typescript + Redux + Passport Local Auth + Emotion
  • MicroTS Microservice code generator with interface-first approach: from OpenAPI (Swagger) REST API specification is generated complete project with TypeScript code, input validator, UI, tests and Docker configuration.
  • pankod/next-boilerplate (â­1.6k) A well-structured production ready Next.js boilerplate with Typescript, Redux, Jest, Enzyme, Express.js, Sass, Css, EnvConfig, Reverse Proxy, Bundle Analyzer and Built-in CLI
  • jsynowiec/node-typescript-boilerplate (â­2.9k) Up-to-date, developer ready and comprehensive, yet minimalistic template. Works out of the box for most Node.js projects. All basic tools included and configured. Targets latest Node.js LTS and TypeScript releases.
  • typescript-express-starter (â­2.8k) - Quick and Easy TypeScript Express Starter.
  • The Knests Stack (â­348) - Full stack boilerplate (hackathon starter) with: PostgreSQL, Knex.js, NestJS, Next.js, GraphQL, React (with hooks and typescript), Material-UI, Docker multistage images for, Docker compose and a Gitlab CI/CD pipeline fully configured.
  • tRPC + Next.js - Full-stack starter projects for end-to-end type safe development with React
  • nd.ts (â­30) - setup bare minimum Node.ts project asap
  • ğŸ™ samchon/backend (â­688) - TypeScript backend template project using the NestJS (nestia (â­2k)) and TypeORM (safe-typeorm (â­230)). It helps newbie backend developers through the derived example projects. Also, it even supports the non-distruptive update system in the process level through the pm2.
  • :man-ok: ts-express-boilerplate (â­26) - ExpressJS / Typescript template good to start backend projects, with a focus on simplicity and minimal features :P It has logging and testing configured out of the box. Typeorm is used for data access.
  • create-typescript-app (â­3) - provides a starting point for TypeScript web applications. pnpm, Rollup, Jest, and CSS Modules with SCSS.
  • ts-vite-npm-template (â­3) - An all-in-one solution for crafting TypeScript-based NPM packages with Vite, complete with built-in GitHub Pages live-demo deployment, automated test-and-build workflows, and Vite-powered unit test configuration, including coverage analysis and a README.md template for your package.

Books

  • ğŸ“š TypeScript in 50 Lessons by Stefan Baumgartner
  • ğŸ“š ğŸ”¥ TypeScript Quickly Learn modern TypeScript and build your own blockchain; Supporting code samples ğŸ™yfain/getts (â­132)
  • ğŸ“š Angular Development with Typescript, Second Edition (MEAP October 2017) Angular Development with Typescript, Second Edition is an intermediate-level tutorial that introduces Angular and TypeScript to developers comfortable with building web applications using other frameworks and tools. (by Yakov Fain and Anton Moiseev; Manning)
  • ğŸ“š Angular 2 Development with TypeScript (2016) by Yakov Fain and Anton Moiseev; Manning
  • ğŸ“š Learning TypeScript 2.x 2nd Ed. by Remo H. Jansen
  • ğŸ“š Mastering TypeScript 2nd Ed. by Nathan Rozentals
  • ğŸ“š Beginning Angular 4 with TypeScript by Greg Lim
  • ğŸ“š Programming with Types - A book on how to design safe, resilient, correct software thatâ€™s easy to maintain and understand by taking advantage of the power of type systems. (by Vlad Riscutia)
  • ğŸ“š Essential TypeScript 5 - Third edition of the bestselling guide to TypeScript. (by Adam Freeman)
  • ğŸ“š Effective TypeScript by Dan Vanderkam
  • ğŸ“š Advanced TypeScript 3 Programming Projects by Peter O'Hanlon
  • ğŸ“š The Concise TypeScript Book (Free and Open Source) (â­8.6k) by Simone Poggiali

Reference Lists

  • TypeScript Reference for JS developers - Glossary of keywords, operators, statements and directives

Blogs

  • @captain-yossarian's blog - fully dedicated to static typings in TypeScript

CLI and REPL

  • Taze (â­3.5k) A modern cli tool that keeps your dependencies fresh
  • Use ts-node (â­13k) to run scripts or REPL

Offline / Visual Studio

  • Visual Studio Community Edition 2015 - free (conditionally) IDE with integrated TypeScript support
    • VS Addon - TypescriptSyntaxPaste - Allow you to copy C# source code, then paste as Typescript syntax which help you with converting DTO or interface
  • NodeJS Tools for Visual Studio (â­1.8k)

Offline / Other (Plugins || Cross-platform || OSS || Free)

  • Visual Studio Code
  • PhpStorm
  • WebStorm
  • CATS is an IDE for TypeScript and Web developers by @jbaron
  • TypeScript Sublime Plugin (â­1.7k) by @Microsoft
  • Atom TypeScript (â­1.1k) by @TypeStrong
  • TypeScript Interactive Development Environment for Emacs (â­1.5k) by @ananthakumaran
  • TypeScript Syntax for VIM (â­1.9k)
  • ğŸ™ Typescript addin for (â­30) MonoDevelop, SharpDevelop and Xamarin Studio; a short review article
  • Typescript tooling for Neovim (â­613) is a language service plugin for typescript for Neovim.

Online / Playground

  • TypeScript playground by @agentcooper, supports multiple TS versions and compiler targets
  • TypeScript playground-on-ace (â­90) by @hi104 updated to TypeScript 1.5 (â­56)
  • TypeScript official Playground
  • JS Bin (Select TypeScript)
  • Codepen (Select TypeScript)
  • TypeScript Interpret - Terminal Emulator by @niutech
  • TypeScript Editor by @drake7707

Build Systems / Playground

  • Zwitterion (â­587) - Super simple development server with built-in support for TypeScript files.
  • Nx (â­26k) - Smart, Fast and Extensible Build System

Cloud Data Warehousing / Playground

  • âœ¨ Crisp BigQuery (â­49) Starter project that delivers Google BigQuery data to end user browsers with cost control. Allows to implement rich data presentation options.
  • DDB-Table (â­129) Strongly typed querys and tables for AWS DynamoDB

Module Bundlers / Playground

  • Farm - Extremely fast Vite-compatible web build tool written in Rust
  • Rspack - A fast Rust-based web bundler ğŸ¦€ï¸
  • Vite - Next Generation Frontend Tooling
  • Webpack - supports CommonJS and AMD module bundling
  • Browserify - CommonJS module bundler. Does not support TypeScript "out of the box", but can be applied with * Grunt tasks: grunt-ts, grunt-browserify, grunt-contrib-uglify
  • fuse-box (â­4k) | http://fuse-box.org/ - typescript sample: fuse-box-ts-react-reflux-seed (â­28)

CMS / Playground

  • Factor - The Javascript CMS (TypeScript supported natively)
  • Graphweaver (â­529) - Turn multiple data sources into a single GraphQL Headless CMS.

Tools / Playground

  • sqlx-ts (â­214) - SQLx-ts is a CLI application featuring compile-time checked queries without a DSL and generates types against SQLs to keep your code type-safe
  • bun - Bun is a fast JavaScript runtime, package manager, bundler, test runner
  • deno - A secure runtime for JavaScript and TypeScript
  • OXC (â­16k) - A suite of high-performance tools for JavaScript and TypeScript written in Rust
  • biome (â­20k) - Biome formats and lints your code in a fraction of a second
  • SweetIQ/schemats (â­1.1k) Generate typescript interface definitions from SQL database schema
  • TypeDoc - A documentation generator for TypeScript projects
  • TypeScript Standard (â­31) - Zero-configuration TypeScript 2 Standard Validation
  • typed-install (â­101) - Easily install new dependencies and their typings, no matter where they may be
  • type-config (â­22) - A generator for tsconfig.
  • Zapatos - Zero-Abstraction Postgres for TypeScript
  • dep-tree (â­1.6k) - Render your project's file dependency tree and/or validate it against your own rules.
  • itertools-ts (â­67) - Extended itertools port for TypeScript and JavaScript. Provides a huge set of functions for working with iterable collections (including async ones).
  • ParaglideJS - An i18n compiler that generates fully typesafe translations
  • pg (â­374) - Browser PostgreSQL Playground, no server, just client and pglite (postgresql wasm)
  • nocodb (â­56k) - ğŸ”¥ ğŸ”¥ ğŸ”¥ Open Source Airtable Alternative

Types / Playground

  • jsonup (â­63) - Compile-time JSON parser
  • type-o-rama (â­245) - JS type systems interoperability
  • utility-types (â­5.7k) - Utility Types for TypeScript (provide compatibility with Flow's Utility Types)
  • elm-ts (â­300) - Port of Elm architecture to TypeScript featuring fp-ts, io-ts, rxjs5 and React
  • ts-essentials (â­4k) - All essential TypeScript types in one place
  • typescript-conditional-types (â­50) - Helpers for typescript generic types
  • ts-types-utils (â­61) - Type utilities for typescript
  • typesync (â­1.6k) - Install missing TypeScript typings for dependencies in your package.json.
  • type-fest (â­16k) - A collection of essential TypeScript types
  • typetype (â­422) - A programming language designed for typescript type generation
  • nominal (â­86) - nominal types & dependent types for Typescript.
  • @tool-belt/type-predicates (â­55) - Type Predicates, Assertion Functions and Utilities.
  • getmytypes (â­11) - Install @types files into your devDependencies.
  • ts-toolbelt (â­7k) - Large collection of type utilities for TypeScript
  • string-ts (â­1.2k) - Strongly-typed string functions for all

CSS In JS With Types / Playground

  • PandaCSS - CSS-in-JS with build time generated styles, RSC compatible, multi-variant support, and best-in-class developer experience
  • Vanilla-Extract - Use TypeScript as your preprocessor. Write typeâ€‘safe, locally scoped classes, variables and themes, then generate static CSS files at build time
  • StyleX - StyleX is a JavaScript library for defining styles for optimized user interfaces

Runtime / Playground

  • json-decoder (â­76) - Typesafe JSON decoder and runtime checker
  • typescript-is (â­963) - TypeScript transformer that generates run-time type-checks.
  • type-plus (â­394) - Additional types and type adjusted utilities
  • Agent Framework (â­124) Create interceptor for your class and method using decorators
  • SunTori (â­10) - A JSON de/serializer to ensure everything is safe at runtime.
  • config (â­22) - Runtime configuration resolver

Validation / Playground

  • @core/match (â­45) - Type-safe destructuring assignment with pattern-match validation
  • zod (â­39k) - TypeScript-first schema validation with static type inference
  • valibot (â­7.8k) - Valibot is a Typescript schema library with static type inference, and it's exceptionally lightweight compared to Zod, with no dependencies.
  • runtypes (â­2.7k) - Runtime validation for static types
  • ts-codec (â­18) - TypeScript Codecs for encoding, decoding and validating data
  • ow (â­3.8k) - Function argument validation for humans
  • superstruct (â­7.1k) - A simple and composable way to validate data
  • computed-types (â­362) - ğŸ¦© Joi like validations for TypeScript
  • json-schema-to-ts (â­1.6k) - Dynamic type inference from JSON schemas
  • Yunomix (â­5) - A form validation toolkit which is designed in AOP form.
  • typia (â­5.2k) - 20,000x times faster runtime validator using pure TypeScript type. Only one line required like typia.assert<T>(input). Also, supports 200x faster JSON serialization, and Protocol Buffer features. ğŸš€ (see also https://typia.io/docs)
  • fta (â­132) - Rust-based static analysis to monitor code quality
  • dto-classes (â­78) - Developer-friendly parsing, validation & serialization. Static types by default. Uses properties for field schemas, not decorators.

Libraries / Chrome Extensions

  • ğŸ™ io-ts (â­6.8k) - Type validation at runtime
  • ğŸ™ SuperJSON (â­4.9k) - Safely serialize JavaScript expressions to a superset of JSON, which includes Dates, BigInts, and more
  • ğŸ™ Procedurem (â­18) - A Small (2kb) And Performant Bi-Directional RPC Library Using WebSockets.
  • ğŸ™ RxJS (â­31k) - A reactive programming library for JavaScript.
  • ğŸ™ xstream (â­2.4k) - An extremely intuitive, small, and fast functional reactive stream library for JavaScript.
  • ğŸ™ mockt (â­10) - Joyful mocking library for Typescript and Javascript
  • ğŸ™ substitute.js (â­208) - A fluent mocking library for TypeScript ported from NSubstitute.
  • ğŸ™ TypeMoq (â­428) - A simple mocking library for TypeScript.
  • ğŸ™ fast-check (â­4.6k) - Property based testing framework for TypeScript.
  • ğŸ™ InversifyJS (â­12k) - powerful and lightweight inversion of control container for JavaScript & Node.js apps powered by TypeScript.
  • ğŸ™ TypeORM (â­36k) - ORM for TypeScript and JavaScript (ES7, ES6, ES5). Supports MySQL, PostgreSQL, MariaDB, SQLite, MS SQL Server, Oracle, WebSQL databases. Works in NodeJS, Browser, Ionic, Cordova and Electron platforms.
    • ğŸ™ Safe-TypeORM (â­230) - Enhances TypeORM in the compilation level and supports automated performance tuning tools through the application level joining. Furthermore, your raw SQL queries would be ensured safety by type meta programming.
  • ğŸ™ MikroORM (â­8.4k) - TypeScript ORM for Node.js based on Data Mapper, Unit of Work and Identity Map patterns. Supports MongoDB, PostgreSQL, MySQL and SQLite.
  • ğŸ™ DrizzleORM - Lightweight TypeScript ORM, SQL-like library for flexible data access, serverless-ready, with zero dependencies.
  • ğŸ™ Prisma (â­43k) - Modern database access (ORM alternative) for Node.js & TypeScript | PostgreSQL, MySQL & SQLite
    • ğŸ™ prisma-markdown (â­506): Generates markdown document composed with ERD diagrams and their descriptions.
  • ğŸ™ Neuledge (â­237) - Neuledge is a universal language for databases that provides state-of-the-art tools for data modeling, business logic representation, and schema validation.
  • ğŸ™ Typetta (â­115) - Typescript ORM for Node.js that uses GraphQL as schema definition language | Supports all main SQL databases and MongoDB.
  • ğŸ™ TypeGQL (â­426) - Set of tools for creating GraphQL schema directly from typed TypeScript class.
  • ğŸ™ TSTL (â­615) - Implementation of C++ STL (Standard Template Library) in TypeScript. Provided modules are containers, iterators, algorithms and functors.
    • ğŸ™ ECol (â­10) - Extension of TSTL containers; collections dispatching Elements I/O events.
    • ğŸ™ TGrid (â­162) - Grid Computing Framework, Network & Thread extension of TSTL, supporting RFC (Remote Function Call).
    • ğŸ™ Mutex-Server (â­31) - Critical sections controller, like mutex and semaphore, in the network level.
  • ğŸ™ Kalimdor.js (â­542) - Machine Learning library for the Web, Node and Developers!
  • ğŸ™ prelude.ts (â­382) - Functional programming: immutable persistent collections, constructs such as Option and Either, and combinators.
  • ğŸ™ ee-ts (â­124) - Typed event emitters
  • ğŸ™ mokia (â­113) - A mock server integrated data simulation and http service.
  • ğŸ™ sub-events (â­38) - Strongly-typed events.
  • ğŸ™ ts-audio (â­336) - an agnostic and easy-to-use library to work with the AudioContext API
  • ğŸ™ tslog (â­1.4k) - A powerful logging library with native TypeScript support: beautiful interpolation, native V8 stack trace, secret masking, support for requestIds based on AsyncLocalStorage
  • ğŸ™ tsParticles (â­8.3k) - A lightweight library for easily creating particles animations for websites (Supports also ReactJS, VueJS, Angular, Svelte and others)
  • ğŸ™ statek (â­9) - Reactive state management library
  • ğŸ™ Injex - Simple, Decorated, Pluggable dependency-injection framework for TypeScript applications
  • ğŸ™ tRPC - TypeScript toolkit for building end-to-end type-safe APIs
  • ğŸ™ interface-forge - Test data factories using TypeScript types and interfaces
  • ğŸ™ iter-ops (â­144) - Operations with iterable objects
  • ğŸ™ Remult (â­3.1k) - End-to-end type-safe CRUD and frontend-backend model code sharing in fullstack TypeScript applications.
  • ğŸ™ Jest (â­45k) - A comprehensive JavaScript testing solution. Works out of the box for most JavaScript projects.
  • ğŸ™ diod (â­147) - A very opinionated and lightweight inversion of control container and dependency injector for Node.js or browser apps.
  • ğŸ™ @deliberative/crypto (â­29) - A Typescript/WebAssembly library for public key cryptography, AEAD secret boxes, Shamir secret sharing and random shuffling. Runs on Nodejs, ESM, CommonJS and the browser.
  • ğŸ™ castore (â­257) - Typescript library to easily implement Event Sourcing in your application
  • ğŸ™ sweet-monads (â­351) - Typescript library for popular monads (such as Maybe or Either) and performant iterators.
  • ğŸ™ simple-mask-money (â­172) - ğŸ’° Simple mask money is a light, safe and typed package to format money!
  • ğŸ™ Color-Core (â­13) - color-core is a powerful, type-safe color manipulation library for TypeScript and JavaScript applications. It provides a comprehensive toolkit for working with colors across multiple color spaces, making it an indispensable tool for developers working on projects that require advanced color handling.

Mobile / Playground

  • ğŸ™ ReactNative - Create native apps for Android, iOS, and more using React
  • ğŸ™ NativeScript (â­25k) - Open Source framework for building cross-platform truly native iOS, Android and Windows mobile apps using JavaScript
  • Monaco Editor

Web / Playground

  • ğŸ™ Angular (â­98k) - Angular is a development platform for building mobile and desktop web applications
  • ğŸ™ It-Tools - Collection of handy online tools for developers, with great UX
  • ğŸ™ feednext.io (â­326) - An open-source social media application built with Typescript on both client-server side.
  • ğŸ™ ionic (â­52k) - An open-source mobile app development framework build in TypeScript
  • ğŸ™ React-UWP (â­1.2k) - React Components that Implement Microsoft's UWP Design & Fluent Design.
  • ğŸ™ palantir/plottable (â­3k) - A library of modular chart components, built on D3 (see also: http://plottablejs.org)
  • ğŸ™ APIs-guru/graphql-voyager (â­7.9k) - Represent any GraphQL API as an interactive graph ğŸ›°ï¸
  • ğŸ™ Rebilly/ReDoc (â­25k) - OpenAPI/Swagger-generated API Reference Documentation
  • ğŸ™ excaliburjs/Excalibur (â­2k) - Free open source JavaScript game engine
  • ğŸ™ Bobril (â­368) - Component oriented framework inspired by Mithril and ReactJs. (see also: http://bobril.com/)
  • ğŸ™ Stencil (â­13k) - a tool for building modern Web Components
  • ğŸ™ Langfuse (â­14k) - Open source LLM engineering platform ğŸª¢ - Tracing, Prompt Mgmt, Evaluations, Analytics
  • ğŸ™ redux-zero (â­2k) - A lightweight state container based on Redux
  • ğŸ™ wretch (â­5k) - A tiny (< 2.2Kb g-zipped) wrapper built around fetch with an intuitive syntax.
  • ğŸ™ Cycle.js (â­10k) - A functional and reactive JavaScript framework for predictable code.
  • ğŸ™ Tridactyl (â­5.8k) - A Firefox browser addon that replaces browser's control mechanism with one modelled on the one true editor, Vim.
  • ğŸ™ armour/vue-typescript-admin-template (â­5.7k) - A vue-cli 3.0 & typescript minimal admin template + a production-ready front-end solution for admin interfaces (demo)
  • ğŸ™ n8n.io (â­117k) - Open Source Workflow Automation Tool
  • ğŸ™ Dnote (â­2.9k) - A command line notebook with a multi-device sync and a web interface.

Back-end API / Playground

  • ğŸ™ Actio (â­263) - The Node.js framework for monoliths and microservices.

  • ğŸ™ Hono - Hono is a small, simple, and ultrafast web framework for the Edges. It works on any JavaScript runtime
  • ğŸ™ Nest (â­72k) - A progressive Node.js framework for building efficient, scalable, and enterprise-grade server-side applications on top of TypeScript ğŸš€ (see also: https://nestjs.com/)
    • ğŸ™ nestia (â­2k) - 20,000x faster validation and 200x faster JSON serialization decorators using typia. Enable to utilize pure TypeScript interface type as DTO, and overall server performance improved by about 30x times. Also, it supports SDK (collection of fetch functions with type definitions) and Mockup Simulator (backend server simulator embedded in SDK) generation, and even possible to migrate NestJS project only by swagger.json file. ğŸš€ (see also: https://nestia.io/docs)
  • ğŸ™ LoopBack 4 (â­5k) - A highly extensible Node.js and TypeScript framework for building APIs and microservices. ğŸš€ (see also: https://loopback.io/)

  • ğŸ™ Libstack - A collection of various modules to create Typescript server easily and ready to be deployed on Docker.
  • ğŸ™ tinyhttp (â­2.8k) - A modern Express-like web framework for Node.js, written in TypeScript and compiled to Native ESM.
  • ğŸ™ ZenTS (â­34) - A modern Node.js and TypeScript first framework for building rich web applications

entry.title: Awesome Typescript Updates on Dec 18 - Dec 24, 2017
entry.content:
CLI and REPL

  • How to make executable typescript scripts:
    1. Make sure you have npx (shipped with npm >= 5.2) and typescript package is installed
    2. Add this shebang as first line to your script: #!npx ts-node
    3. Make script executable: chmod +x script.ts
    4. Run directly: ./script.ts :)
